thread.title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate Williamson Street sexual assault
thread.title_full: Savannah-Chatham police investigate Williamson Street sexual assault | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate Williamson Street sexual assault
text:
By Savannah Morning News
Savannah-Chatham police are investigation a sexual assalt that was reported near the 300 block of Williamson Street between 2:30 and 3:30 a.m. on Friday.
The victim, a 19-year-old female, was reportedly walking on Williamson Street when approached by an unknown male in a truck who sexually assaulted her, said Eunicia Baker, Savannah-Chatham police spokeswoman.
The suspect is described as a clean shaven, middle-aged, white male, with gray or white ear-length hair, Baker said. The suspect has a slender build and stands approximately 5-foot-6. He wore light-colored clothing during the incident. He may have fled in a white truck.
Anyone with information on this case should call CrimeStoppers at 912-234-2020 or text CRIMES (274637) using the keyword CSTOP2020. Tipsters remain anonymous and may qualify for a cash reward.
A confidential tip line also is open directly to investigators at 912-525-3124.
